abstract: Bracing for more criticism over its enormous bailouts, Citigroup shook up its board on Friday and is preparing a marketing campaign to revamp its image with Washington and Wall Street, The New York Times reported.
snippet: Bracing for more criticism over its enormous bailouts, Citigroup shook up its board on Friday and is preparing a marketing campaign to revamp its image with Washington and Wall Street, The New York Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Bracing for more criticism over its enormous bailouts, Citigroup shook up its board on Friday and is preparing a marketing campaign to revamp its image with Washington and Wall Street, The New York Times’s Eric Dash writes.

headline.main: Shake-Up Is Citi’s Latest Rebranding Attempt
